name: package-size
description: This extension will provide you with the size of a file and you can check liveas   and when you selectively import

packageSize.bundleSizeColoring.description: Which bundle size to use for selecting the color

packageSize.smallPackageSize.description: Upper size limit, in KB, that will count a package as a small package

packageSize.mediumPackageSize.description: Upper size limit, in KB, that will count a package as a medium package

packageSize.smallPackageDarkColor.description: Decoration color for small packages in dark theme

packageSize.mediumPackageDarkColor.description: Decoration color for medium packages in dark theme

packageSize.largePackageDarkColor.description: Decoration color for large packages in dark theme

packageSize.smallPackageLightColor.description: Decoration color for small packages in light theme

packageSize.mediumPackageLightColor.description: Decoration color for medium packages in light theme

packageSize.largePackageLightColor.description: Decoration color for large packages in light theme

packageSize.margin.description: Decoration margin from end of line

packageSize.typescriptExtensions.description: File extensions to be parsed by the Typescript parser

packageSize.javascriptExtensions.description: File extensions to be parsed by the Javascript parser

packageSize.showCalculatingDecoration.description: Display the 'calculating' decoration when starting to calculate the size

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
